name: Fatal Fish Fight
description:
FATAL FISH FIGHT FINAL FIGHT FOR FISHKIND FRESH FASHIONABLE FEROCIOUS FLIPPY FLOPPY FORBIDDEN FISH FIGHT Feel free to fight your friends in this family-friendly fish game! It is the ultimate Party-Brawler Game, that competes even with the most competitive Local Multiplayer Games out there! 4 Combatants Sword Fish

Faster than any fish in the seven seas. dash through the Battlefield and impale the other Combatants with your pointy nose.

Squid

This Squid is not to be trifled with. You may think his ink will only blind you, but THATS WERE YOU ARE WRONG. It injects a poisonous venom in the other combatant's fins and kills them instantly.

Hammerhead

This Womanizer is too proud to look other fishes into their eyes. He simply whacks all fishes out of the seven seas.

Puffer Fish

Actually, the Pufferfish didn't sign up for this fight, but she got involved somehow... I guess. Nonetheless a formidable combatant. Her Ability is to protect herself of any harm while being incredibly pointy on top of that. BEWARE FISHES!

Controls Contributors

Zel'ak'irr (Nicolas Vana) - Programming, Game Assets
MalevolentGoat (Matthias Gölzner) - Programming, Game Assets
Zerebratox (Felix Macho) - Music Themes
